name: TOJam10 _ SpaceJam
description:
Warning, This is buggy. Also, I Apologizes for the difficulty, I didn't get a chance to play test properly

Know Bug: sometimes when you land on the 'exit' it won't register properly... just 'bunny hop' slightly to re-register the hit

Buttons:

Space = main thruster

A / D = left right rotation thrusters

O = reset level (clears debry)

P = restart game (goes back to level 0)
